welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Borken, Germany! Get ready to experience the charm of our small town, known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and explore all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful time!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stadtlohn Vreden Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Stadtlohn Vreden Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Essen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Essen Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Twente Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Twente Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.
